title: HOW TO STOP PEOPLE TARGETING THE TANKS???
body: Second ranked game in a row, a tank shows itself and the other four fuckwits on my team focus it. Over everyone else. Every fight. Telling them to stop does nothing. They just...keep doing it. AAAAAAAnd doing it. What the fuck? Is school out or something?

replies.body:
Communication is how you deal with it. Unfortunately you are likely to have very little communication in YoloQ.

But here a thing you should remember, a lot of focused tanks like say Sejuani {{champion:113}} , Rammus {{champion:33}} , Zac {{champion:154}}  and Sion {{champion:14}}  can do LOTS and I mean LOTS of damage with just tanks items, in low elo most people don't understand how to focus or peel, so they attack whatever is hitting them and doing damage at the time.

Then you have another problem which is more common to me, the tank shows up about a minute before the rest of the team. Now in this instance you have no choice but to focus the tank. He is there, no one else, and once the rest of his team does show up it isn't as easy as 1 2 3 to switch to the squishies as you want to believe it is. Often when a tank is that deep you can't just go around them and ignore them.
Congrats dianasgotswag! You are officially the first person to qq on OCE boards!
Had a guy rage at me for focusing a lee instead of irella ( because lee is a "tank") Even though i was ryze and lee had 55MR and irealla had 203 MR.
{{champion:6}} a build a last whisper then you target EVER{{champion:11}}ONE!

> Second ranked game in a row, a tank shows itself and the other four fuckwits on my team focus it. Over everyone else. Every fight. Telling them to stop does nothing. They just...keep doing it. AAAAAAAnd doing it. What the fuck? Is school out or something?

Hi friend,
                Now you may think that them focusing a tank is wrong, but that is how the game works. Frontline tanks are in the meta and they deal off a lot of damage if not dealt with. There is only little circumstances when a carry can ignore the tank. Supports need to peel for the carries and sometimes tanks stack only armour so your ap mid is a great tool to deal with the tank and help your marksman out. Try to focus on your game and not your teammates and what they are doing. You will become a better player, no problem.

It's not always the easiest option to hit a carry over a tank, i don't obviously know your situation but just something to keep in mind.. if you were their champion and had a tank running at you, what would you do?
School should end in around December - End of December.
